010package imagingbook.pub.color.filters;
011
012public class CircularMask {
013        
014        private final int center;                       // mask center position
015        private final int count;                        // number of nonzero mask elements
016        private final int[][] mask;                     // mask[x][y]  specifies the support region
017                
018        public CircularMask(double radius) {
019                center = Math.max((int) Math.ceil(radius), 1);
020                //IJ.log("mask radius = " + center);
021                int mWidth = 2 * center + 1;            // width/height of mask array
022                mask = new int[mWidth][mWidth];                 // initialized to zero
023                int cnt = 0;
024                double r2 = radius * radius + 1;                // add 1 to get mask shape similar to ImageJ
025                for (int u = 0; u < mWidth; u++) {
026                        int x = u - center;
027                        for (int v = 0; v < mWidth; v++) {
028                                int y = v - center;
029                                if (x*x + y*y <= r2) {
030                                        mask[u][v] = 1;
031                                        cnt = cnt + 1;
032                                }
033                        }
034                }
035                count = cnt;
036        }
037        
038        public int getCenter() {
039                return center;
040        }
041        
042        public int getCount() {
043                return count;
044        }
045        
046        public int[][] getMask() {
047                return mask;
048        }
049
050}
